data.eml:eml: Two new species of forget-me-nots (Myosotis, Boraginaceae) from New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lehnebach, Carlos A. (2012): Two new species of forget-me-nots (Myosotis, Boraginaceae) from New Zealand. PhytoKeys 16: 53-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.16.3602, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.16.3602
